comments.raw_text:
At the moment there is:
* code in editorOverlay.xul that is only used in editor.xul and so should probably be moved to editor.xul along with corresponding entities from editorOverlay.dtd to editor.dtd.
* JS in editor.js that is used by editorOverlay.xul and so should probably be moved to editorOverlay.js and vice-versa.
* other code that doesn't belong in editorOverlay and should be moved to a more appropriate file.

This bug is for tracking the various other bugs for moving code around.
comments.creator: iannbugzilla@gmail.com
